Managed Detection
& Response (MDR)

Would you like to identify and eradicate the real security issues threatening the integrity of your organisation?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1595424190489{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/MDR.jpg?id=9490) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601027548158{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Managed Detection & Response
(MDR)

Would you like to identify and eradicate the real security issues threatening the integrity of your organisation?

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1600440651804{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/hone-bg-n.jpg?id=8951) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1588847349437{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″]

What are the benefits of MDR?

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″ el_class=”square-icons”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Identify and eradicate the real security issues threatening the integrity of your organisation.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Reduce the time to respond to a security breach or attack.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Our Detection in Depth approach leverages multiple protective and analytical capabilities to provide a multi-layered defensive security posture.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_position=”left top” css=”.vc_custom_1597159774849{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Background-Slashesv6-e1597159764970.jpg?id=11024) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1597159334005{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/462948948″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600859054858{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/raise_the_bar.jpg?id=12269) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:90px|padding_bottom_large:70px”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Raise the bar on MDR

[vc_column_text]The attacks of yesterday are no indication of the attacks of tomorrow. It’s time to raise the bar on MDR.

Our fully-managed MDR service, Triarii, discovers and proactively responds to cyber threats in real-time, delivering a defence that is just as adaptive as the threats are.

Combining security information and event management (SIEM), network detection and response, and endpoint detection and response (EDR). Triarii analyses your entire environment, including Cloud networks, servers, firewalls, and end-points for indication of targeted attacks, helping you protect your data.[/vc_column_text]

Learn more about how we work with you for 24/7 detection and response services.

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1600936599265{padding-top: 2em !important;padding-bottom: 2em !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/mdr-grey-bg-yellow.jpg?id=11570) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”reducing-time-to-respond” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:6em|padding_bottom_large:6em|padding_top_medium:4em|padding_bottom_medium:4em”][vc_column width=”1/2″ enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Up” responsive_css=”margin_bottom_large:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600859328949{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Reducing the time to respond

[vc_column_text]Our fully-managed MDR service, Triarii can help reduce the mean time to detect (MTTD) and respond (MTTR) to an incident.

Reducing the time taken to detect and respond to an incident is a significant factor in reducing the time, effort and cost involved with a security incident.

Put simply, the sooner an incident can be detected and dealt with, the easier and cheaper it is to ensure the business continues to operate.

Triarii has been designed to reduce MTTR. With features such as Detection in Depth, Security Configuration Analysis, Suspicious Email Analysis, Endpoint Detection & Response we can act on suspicious activity within seconds and take immediate action by terminating processes or isolating machines.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Up”]

Identify and eradicate real security issues

[vc_column_text]We continuously analyse your entire environment including, Cloud, network, servers, firewalls, and endpoints, for indications of targeted attacks – 24x7x365. Triarii rapidly evaluates severity and impact and we can take appropriate action on your behalf, so you can rest easy.

By using Triarii you can prevent breaches, reduce cyber risk, support compliance, and help address the stringent breach detection and reporting requirements required by The Security of Network & Information Systems Regulations (NIS Regulations), the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and GPG-13.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”0″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1600771216903{background-color: #122135 !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Up” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ responsive_css=”padding_top_large:6em|padding_right_large:40px|padding_bottom_large:6em|padding_left_large:40px|padding_top_medium:0px|padding_right_medium:10vw|padding_bottom_medium:0px|padding_left_medium:10vw” css=”.vc_custom_1601977979232{padding-top: 3em !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 3em !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_class=”o2c-white-text”]

Our Detection in Depth approach

[vc_column_text]

Our philosophy is achieved by leveraging multiple protective and analytical capabilities to provide a multi-layered defensive security posture, protecting staff. The service combines capabilities such as EDR, SIEM, Security Configuration Assessment, Suspicious Email Triage and External IP Monitoring as standard.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1600936821357{padding-top: 3em !important;padding-bottom: 3em !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Falanx-Image2-e1600776142168.jpg?id=12596) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Up”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1600863431844{padding-top: 2em !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 2em !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Background-1.png?id=8728) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:4em|padding_right_large:5em|padding_bottom_large:4em|padding_left_large:5em”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1601635075508{padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_bottom_large:0px|padding_left_large:5em” el_class=”cta-banner”][vc_column_text]

Looking for managed detection and response service to hunt for and proactively respond to cyber-threats in real-time?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ responsive_css=”padding_left_large:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600863580832{padding-left: 15px !important;}”] Request a quote [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597677709712{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Our service

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text el_class=”mobile-left”]

Our MDR service, Triarii comes with all the tools needed to keep your systems and environment safe from cyber-threats. Triarii for Sentinel is available for organisations making substantial use of Microsoft Azure.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” equal_height=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”35″ ca_init_rotate_x=”0″ ca_init_rotate_y=”0″ ca_init_translate_z=”0″ ca_init_rotate_z=”0″ ca_duration=”1200″ ca_delay=”150″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Triarii

Click here

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Triarii for Sentinel

Click here

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601388585654{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
